greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Length times maximum of the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1,...,y_k) is prime(y_1)*...*prime(y_k), so a(n) is the size of the minimal rectangle containing the Young digram of the integer partition with Heinz number n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to Heinz numbers
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jul 26 2019
